About Me

Don Draper for startups? The startup brand whisperer? I really need to get a copywriter to look at this.

Point is, I’m Patrick, and I’m a hybrid ad man/startup guy, with several years of experience bridging the best of both worlds.

I represent the venturing arm of archer>malmo, where we build brands for early-stage startups, either for equity or for fees that make sense for where you are.

I’m also really proud of the Brand Strategy Canvas. It’s a tool we made to help startups actualy do brand strategy. Check it out.

Find me on:

  • @patrickjwoods

About this site

This blog is built on Jekyll and is based on the Hyde theme. It’s stored on github and is deployed automatically using a neat tool calld Deploy.
